doc.field: Specifics (Building Code Task Force). World Trade Center. Education.
Specifics (Building Code Task Force). World Trade Center. Education.

Spadafora was on the NYC Model Buildings Code Program, Fire Protection Technical Committee (circa 2003-04). Box includes much material related to this: Binder of material from Alliance for Fire Safety re: A Call to Action: Why & How the New Model Building Codes Should be Changed (2003); Binder with table comparing 2003 International Building Code (IBC) with 2002 NYC Building Code (BCCNY); International Fire Code print matter; thick folder of minutes, email, reports, etc. Also a thick folder on the World Trade Center Building Code Task Force, 2004, which seems related but not the same as above (includes Spadafora's article in WNYF on this, with floppies). Some material on FDNY training for new fire code (2006). CD for Fire Inspection Resource Exercise Simulation (training). See also box 7431. (Includes digital formats)
Specifics (Building Code Task Force). World Trade Center. Education.
